alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 7:25PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin...Iowa... Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting La Crosse, Vernon and Houston Counties. Mississippi River at Winona affecting Winona, Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Allamakee, Grant, Clayton and Crawford Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 15.2 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.
